casebody.data:
No. 1635. Cureton v. Westfield.

November Term, 1884.

January 7, 1885. F. F. Stokes, for appellant. Wells $ Orr, contra.

Opinion by

Mr. Justice McIver,

The facts of this case are the same as in the case next infra, except that no attempt was made to serve the answer until sixty days after the remittitur was filed with the clerk of the Court of Common Pleas for Greenville County.

Judgment of Hudson, J., affirmed.
